tool_description: Its an API to Fetch HTML page & return exctracted data by CSS selectors (if specified).Its a HTML Page Data Extractor.
name: HtmlParser
title: HtmlParser

api_list.name: fetch_and_extract
api_list.description:
Endpoint: /fetch-and-extract
Method: GET

Description:
The /fetch-and-extract endpoint allows you to fetch HTML content from a specified URL and extract structured data based on provided CSS selectors. This API is designed for web scraping, providing a simple and flexible way to extract information from HTML pages.

**Parameters:**

url (required): The URL of the HTML page you want to scrape.

selectors (required): An array of CSS selectors specifying the elements to extract from the HTML page.
